description: Generated when a probe failure is detected when the
corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to
probeFailure(2) subject to the value of pingCtlTrapFilter.
pingCtlTrapFilter can be used to specify the number of
successive probe failures that are required before this
notification can be generated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingProbeFailed ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE

description: Specifies the type of host address to be used at a remote host
for performing a ping operation.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType

description: Specifies the host address to be used at a remote host for
performing a ping operation. The host address type is
determined by the object value of corresponding
pingCtlTargetAddressType.
A value for this object MUST be set prior to transitioning
its corresponding pingCtlEntry to active(1) via
pingCtlRowStatus.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress

description: Reflects the operational state of a pingCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus

description: This objects reports the IP address associated
with a pingCtlTargetAddress value when the destination
address is specified as a DNS name. The value of
this object should be a zero length octet string
when a DNS name is not specified or when a
specified DNS name fails to resolve.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress

description: The minimum ping round-trip-time (RTT) received. A value
of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt

description: The maximum ping round-trip-time (RTT) received. A value
of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt

description: The current average ping round-trip-time (RTT).
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt

description: Number of responses received for the corresponding
pingCtlEntry and pingResultsEntry. The value of this object
MUST be reported as 0 when no probe responses have been
received.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses

description: The value of this object reflects the number of probes sent
for the corresponding pingCtlEntry and pingResultsEntry.
The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no probes
have been sent.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes

description: This object contains the sum of the squares for all ping
responses received. Its purpose is to enable standard
deviation calculation. The value of this object MUST
be reported as 0 when no ping responses have been
received.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares

description: Date and time when the last response was received for
a probe.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe

description: Generated when a ping test is determined to have failed
when the corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is
set to testFailure(3). In this instance
pingCtlTrapFilter should specify the number of probe
failures required in a test to have failed in order to
considered the test as failed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingTestFailed ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE

description: Specifies the type of host address to be used at a remote host
for performing a ping operation.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType

description: Date and time when the last response was received for
a probe.
variables.name: ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe

description: Generated at the completion of a ping test when the
corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to
testCompletion(4).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingTestCompleted ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes c 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 ASCEND-DISMAN-PING-V1-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE
